values:
i am soooooo relaxed, what a wonderful feeling..i forgot that this feeling is existing...no studying, not getting up early, no books...its great!:D
on friday we're going to sylt, its an island in germany, takes three hours to get there. we're gonna stay there until sunday. Just chilling, going to te beach, to the movies and stuff. on sunday we're leaving and we gonna head towards denmark to meet my parents.Staying there till wednesday-we gotta go back cause we're going to the musical "Vampires" on wednesday evening. so YAY!
at the end of septemeber we're  going to milano (italy) for a few days, just doing sight seeing, thats gonna be cool. and THEN we're going on a cruise with my bf's parents...stopping in Tunis, Malta, Sizillien, Neapel and Mallorca...sounds good huh?!:)
so a "busy" time coming up:))

YAY WE PASSED!
its finally over, our oral part of the exam went really well...it was quite exhausting, lasted over 4 hours but who cares... finally no more sutdying until like octobre...then the important part of  our studies start-were gonna start studying in the hospitals, gonna learn about illnesses and how to cure them.i am excited about it, but for the moment i am just happy to have some time-off again...gotta run now, me and my bf are going to a soccer game. yall take care:)

So on thursday and friday i took the written part of the state exam, surprisingly i did well! we already know the right answers and we were allowed to keep the book with the questions so I already know I passed the written part, with a C, might not sound great to yall but its just all about passing:D my bf passed too so were happy...:) the oral exam is next thursday...well see...:)

i forgot to say that since like 3 days i am "almost-aunt A.K."!YAY...my boyfriends sister gave birth to the cutest boy u've ever seen (I guess everybody says so about "their" babies but HE really is) unfortunately they gotta stay in the hospital until sunday because "seine Bilirubin Werte sind auf Grund von einer noch mangelnder Ausbildung seiner Leber nicht in Ordnung" anyone here to translate that sentence? I cant. to put it in an easier sentence there is something wrong with his blood! hehehe take care

so i actually dont really know what this thingy is about, jen said its a good way to keep in touch -so here i am  *g*

I just hope to get back in touch with some of y'all.

So I guess I gotta tell ya whats going on in my life at the moment... Some of yall probably know that I am majoring in medical sciences. Were having our first state exam on thursday. around 45 percent of all students fail- I am so nervous about it.  At first I was intending to take the exam in march but my boyfriend  has to take it now so we decided to give it a try.  If we fail (which is pretty likely )we can retake it twice so it aint that bad. (but still depressing I guess...)

The test is for the basic studies of the medical sciences (anatomy ,physiology, biochemistry, biology, physics, chemistry,psychology )we get 360 multiple choice questions and we got an oral exam in anatomy, biochemistry and physiology...
We'll see what comes out of it I just wish I could fall asleep and skip the next three weeks ...lol

Talk to ya soon:)
